block.p: Major League Baseball MLB--Suspended Boston OF Carl Everett 10 games and fined him an undisclosed amount for bumping an umpire twice during a game against the New York Mets on July 15.
Major League Baseball MLB--Suspended Boston OF Carl Everett 10 games and fined him an undisclosed amount for bumping an umpire twice during a game against the New York Mets on July 15.
American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Named Annie Huidekoper community affairs manager and Julie Idelkope director of state and local government affairs.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Optioned LHP Daniel Garibay to Iowa of the PCL. Recalled RHP Kyle Farnsworth from Iowa. MONTREAL EXPOS--Fired Bobby Cuellar, pitching coach, and Luis Pujols, bench coach. Named Brad Arnsberg pitching coach and Jeff Cox bench coach for the remainder of the season.

National Basketball Association NBA--Suspended Sacramento G Jason Williams for the first five regular season games of the 2000-01 season for not complying with his treatment obligations under the NBA-NBPA Anti-Drug program.

National Football League BALTIMORE RAVENS--Agreed to terms with TE Ben Coates on a one-year contract. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Released WR Carl Pickens. DALLAS COWBOYS--Awarded WR Morris Anderson an injury settlement. Signed WR Darren Hall. DENVER BRONCOS--Agreed to terms with WR Andre Reed and CB Terrell Buckley. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Claimed G-C Grant Garrett off waivers from the Kansas City Chiefs. Waived CB Evan Howell. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed DT Daryl Gardener to a seven-year contract extension.
BEACH VOLLEYBALL AMERICA--Named Lori Okimura chief operating officer.

ASHLAND--Named Kelly Stutz women's assistant basketball coach. AUBURN--Named Chris Finwood assistant baseball coach. BROCKPORT STATE--Named Andrea Zurlo women's field hockey coach. CLARKSON--Named Jim Kane baseball coach. DELAWARE--Named David Henderson men's basketball coach. EAST TEXAS BAPTIST--Named Eugene Kirkpatrick assistant athletic trainer. ILLINOIS--Signed Bill Self, men's basketball coach, to a five-year contract. MERCER--Named Alan Edwards volleyball coach. PHILADELPHIA--Named Jesse Balcer men's assistant basketball coach.
